title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 28.2 - Size of containers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 28.2 - Size of containers

State Regulations
(a) No
holder of a distributor's alcohol permit shall sell or deliver any alcohol to
any holder of an IAP permit in containers different from the size designated in
such permit, except by express permission first obtained by the permittee from
the State Liquor Authority in writing. (b) No holder of a distributor's alcohol
permit shall sell or deliver any alcohol to any holder of an AP permit in
containers larger than five gallons, except by express permission first
obtained by the permittee from the State Liquor Authority in writing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
28.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
